sentences.en: Always borrow money a pessimist, he doesn't expect to be paid back.
sentences.cn: 想借钱?去向悲观主义者要钱吧, 反正他也不指望你还钱.

sentences.en: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won't expect it back.
sentences.cn: 跟悲观主义者借钱吧! 他反正不指望你还!

sentences.en: An optimist laughs to forget a pessimist forgets to laugh.
sentences.cn: 乐观主义者笑着忘记,悲观主义者却忘记了笑.

sentences.en: An optimist sees the rose a pessimist sees the thorn.
sentences.cn: 乐观的人看到玫瑰,悲观的人只能看到刺.

sentences.en: And pessimist may be fear and is always negative.
sentences.cn: 但是悲观的人会很恐惧又总是会很消极.

sentences.en: Borrow money from a pessimist - they don't expect it back.
sentences.cn: 可以考虑跟悲观的人借钱因为他们不会期望你还钱.

sentences.en: Don't be so pessimist, look the bright side of this story.
sentences.cn: 不要这么悲观, 要看到事情积极的一面.

sentences.en: I'm a natural pessimist; I usually expect the worst.
sentences.cn: 我是天生的悲观主义者。我总是做最坏的打算。

sentences.en: Know the difference between a pessimist and an optimist?
sentences.cn: 知道乐观派和悲观派之间有什么不同 吗 ?

sentences.en: The man who is a pessimist before forty - eight knows too much; the man who is an optimist after forty - eight knows too little.
sentences.cn: 未逾 四十八 岁的悲观主义者,是知道得太多之人; 而年逾 四十八 岁的乐观主义者,是知道得太少之人.

sentences.en: The pessimist feels like fate's plaything and moves slowly.
sentences.cn: 悲观者则感到自己只能由命运摆布,行动拖拉.

sentences.en: The pessimist stumbles over pebbles even on a wide and well - paved road.
sentences.cn: 悲观的人,即使走在平坦的大道,也会被小石子绊跌.

sentences.en: To a profound pessimist life , being in danger is not depressing.
sentences.cn: 留意这个人,他肯定不是个好东西.

sentences.en: You don't have to be a pessimist to realize that we're in trouble.
sentences.cn: 不是悲观论者也能意识到我们有了麻烦。

悲观，悲观情绪；厌世主义

trans.tran_cn: 悲观主义者，悲观者，厌世者
trans.tran_en: someone who always expects that bad things will happen
